articles.title: Netflix becomes frontrunner in bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery, sources say - CNN
articles.description: Netflix’s most recent offer, submitted on Thursday, valued the Warner Bros. studio, HBO Max streaming service and related parts of the company at around $28 per share, sources said.

articles.title: TOYOTA GAZOO Racing World Premieres GR GT & GR GT3 - TOYOTA GAZOO Racing
articles.description: TOYOTA GAZOO Racing (TGR) today world premiered two new models—the GR GT and GR GT3—by publicly displaying under-development prototypes for the first time.

articles.title: Chicago Tribune sues Perplexity - TechCrunch
articles.description: The newspaper is alleging copyright infringement and calling out Perplexity's Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) as a culprit.

articles.title: All the biggest news from AWS’ big tech show re:Invent 2025 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Amazon Web Services' giant tech conference re:Invent 2025 is happening this week with news ranging from chips to AI services.

articles.title: FDA chief says Biden administration withheld data on heart risk from Covid vaccines - NBC News
articles.description: The Biden administration withheld data from the public on the risks of myocarditis from the Covid vaccine, FDA Commissioner Marty Makary claimed Thursday.

articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P 500 Slip; Hims, Meta in Focus — Live Updates - The Wall Street Journal
Apple’s executive shake-up continues with departures of general counsel and policy head - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple loses two more top senior executives with exits of longtime general counsel Kate Adams and environmental VP Lisa Jackson. Meta’s Jennifer Newstead is set to join as new general counsel in 2026.

articles.title: Money Grows On This Tree As Discount Retailers Crush Estimates - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Dollar Tree, Five Below, Dollar General earnings wallop analyst views. DG stock surges, DLTR shares set to break out.

articles.title: US senators seek to block Nvidia sales of advanced chips to China - Financial Times
articles.description: Bipartisan bill is part of effort to stop Beijing from getting critical AI-related technology

articles.title: Employers have cut 1.1 million jobs this year. Here's what's behind the wave of layoffs. - CBS News
articles.description: Job cuts so far this year are at their highest levels since 2020, new report says.

articles.title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg went all in on the metaverse. Now Reality Labs is facing big cuts. - Business Insider
articles.description: Meta plans Reality Labs budget cuts up to 30%, weighing job cuts amid metaverse losses and renewed focus on AI technology.

articles.title: Abbott issues ‘urgent' message to patients after medical devices linked to 700 injuries, 7 deaths - NBC 5 Chicago
articles.description: The malfunctioning glucose sensors have been linked to 700 serious injuries and seven deaths.

articles.title: YouTube TV surprises subscribers with a long-awaited addition - TheStreet
articles.description: YouTube TV makes another long-awaited move to please subscribers.

articles.title: Kill Baby Kill: Trump rolls back US fuel economy standards calling it 'green new scam' - Times of India
articles.description: US News: US President Donald Trump announced a significant rollback of fuel-economy standards, lowering targets from 50.4 mpg to 34.5 mpg. This decision effect

articles.title: Waymo responds to safety concerns amid investigation into incidents caught on school bus cameras - ABC News
Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang admits he works 7 days a week, including holidays, in a constant 'state of anxiety' out of fear of going bankrupt - Fortune
articles.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says fear of failure is still what drives him—so he runs the business like it's going to go bankrupt in 33 days

articles.title: For Wall Street, pandemic-level bad news for jobs is good news for stocks—it pushes the Fed further into cutting territory - Fortune
articles.description: Fed rate-cut odds surge toward 90% as weak labor data, ADP losses, and Challenger layoffs fuel Wall Street hopes for a December move despite a divided FOMC.

articles.title: Acting Chairman Pham Announces First-Ever Listed Spot Crypto Trading on U.S. Regulated Exchanges - Commodity Futures Trading Commission | CFTC (.gov)
articles.description: CFTC Acting Chairman Caroline D. Pham today announced that listed spot cryptocurrency products will begin trading for the first time in U.S. federally regulated markets on CFTC registered futures exchanges.

articles.title: Talking Cars 487: Consumer Reports' 2026 Automotive Report Card - Consumer Reports
articles.description: Episode 487 of the Talking Cars With Consumer Reports video podcast covers the best and worst in car reliability, owner satisfaction, and road tests.

articles.title: Critical React, Next.js flaw lets hackers execute code on servers - BleepingComputer
articles.description: A maximum severity vulnerability, dubbed 'React2Shell', in the React Server Components (RSC) 'Flight' protocol allows remote code execution without authentication in React and Next.js applications.
